headline: Civitas Executives Show Steady Confidence Despite Legal and Rating Challenges
summary: Civitas Resources, Inc. (NYSE:CIVI) is one of the 10 Energy Stocks with Insider Buying in 2025. Insider transactions see a positive uptick amid mixed analyst sentiments and lawsuits. Founded in 2021, the domestic oil and natural gas exploration and production company, Civitas Resources, Inc. (NYSE:CIVI), focuses on the Denver-Julesburg and Permian basins. The Colorado-based company […]
